meanings.definition: To show or display something for others to see.
meanings.sent1: She will exhibit her artwork at the school fair.
meanings.sent2: The museum will exhibit rare artifacts next month.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to exhibit its acrobatic skills by climbing the curtains.
meanings.sent4: His behavior at the party seemed to exhibit a lack of manners.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display will exhibit a dazzling array of colors in the night sky.

meanings.definition: An object or collection of objects displayed for public viewing.
meanings.sent1: The dinosaur skeleton is the main exhibit at the museum.
meanings.sent2: Visitors enjoyed exploring the various exhibits at the science center.
meanings.sent3: The exhibit of antique cars brought back nostalgic memories for many visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was an exhibit of vibrant flowers and lush greenery.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibit featured stunning paintings by local artists.
